Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the job creation under President Obama by comparing it to the entire Bush Presidency.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide specific data or evidence to back up the comparison between job creation under Obama and Bush.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that job creation in the last four months will continue at the same pace for the rest of the year, which may not be a valid assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There could be alternative explanations for the difference in job creation between Obama and Bush, such as economic conditions or policies beyond the control of the presidents.
